title: Photo-Eye of the Twenties
description:
This exhibition contained 158 photographs from the decade 1920-1930, most of which were praised when they were first exhibited or reproduced. Images from the following artists were displayed: Eugene Atget, Herbert Bayer, Francis Bruguiere, Alvin
Langdon Coburn, Imogen Cummingham, Hugo Erfurth, Max Ernst, Walker Evans, Andrea Feininger, Lux Feininger, Florence Henri, Andre Kertesz, Helmar Lerski, Ray Man, Tina Modotti, Laszlo Moholy-Nagy, Paul Outerbridge, Walter A. Peterhans, Albert Renger- Patzsch, Alexander Rodchenko, August Sander, Christian Schad, Kurt Schwitters, Charles Sheeler, Edward Steichen, Ralph Steiner, Alfred Stieglitz, Paul Strand, Brett Weston and Edward Weston.
